Title: Venice: Lion City.
Subtitle: The Religion of Empire.
Authors: Garry Wills.
Categories: History.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=OaarttemhYgC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&edge=curl&source=gbs_api.
Description: A unique historical perspective on Venice, one of the world's most fascinating cities, during the fifteenth and sixteenth centuries, is told through the art, which is connected to its imperial religion and which details the labor, warfare, government, prayer, and discipline of the time.
